sys_properties.description:
Comma-separated list of plugin sys_ids or source names that should be skipped during automatic updates. This allows you to exclude specific plugins from the automatic update process.
Format: Comma-separated values Type: String Example: "com.servicenow.plugin1,com.servicenow.plugin2"
Use cases: - Exclude plugins that require special handling - Skip plugins that are known to cause issues - Prevent updates to critical plugins during automated runs - Exclude plugins that are managed through other processes
Note: - Values can be either plugin sys_ids or source names - Spaces around commas are automatically trimmed - Empty values are ignored - Case-sensitive matching
sys_properties.name: x_snc_update_all.plugin.update.skip.list
